comprehensive_overview: The r-backports package provides features and enhanced functionality for the R programming language by backporting new features found in recent versions of R to older versions of R. This allows users to access new functions and capabilities in older R versions to ensure compatibility with their existing workflows and packages.
core_features: Backports new features from recent R versions to older R versions
Enhances compatibility with existing R packages and code
Facilitates access to updated functions and capabilities
